key_risks: Competitive pressures from larger telecom players like Verizon, AT&T, and T-Mobile
Regulatory challenges, including spectrum allocation and net neutrality rules
Inconsistent financial performance with a 6.31% revenue decline in 2023
Limited nationwide network coverage compared to competitors
Potential financial liabilities from a class-action lawsuit regarding false statements
controversies: Class-action lawsuit alleging false statements about a promotion to reduce customer churn

sources.title: T-Mobile and UScellular, GN Docket No. 24-286
sources.snippet: T-Mobile US, Inc. (T-Mobile) and United States Cellular Corporation (UScellular) have announced an agreement for the transfer to T-Mobile of UScellular's wireless operations, customers, and certain spectrum licenses and spectrum leases.
